name: Dead Faces
storyline: The days seem to blend together as you slowly forget the world outside your apartment. Visions of people you've known begin to plague you through increasingly worse hallucinations. Explore and live through each day in your apartment and face your past as you gradually lose your grasp on reality to reclaim your memories.
summary: Dead Faces is a mind bending psychological horror about hallucinations and facing your past. Unravel Jack's disturbing mind, the faces from his past and the ultimate truth behind his actions. You must remember their faces.
